question: India ranked _________ among 119 developing countries on the Global Hunger Index 2017.
explanation: India is ranked 100th among 119 developing countries on the Global Hunger Index 2017. As per the report, India ranks below many of its neighbouring countries such as China (29th rank), Nepal (72), Myanmar (77), Sri Lank (84) and Bangladesh (88). It is ahead of Pakistan (106) and Afghanistan (107).
